More examplesFewer examples After four chemotherapy treatments, the cancer that had grown so terrifyingly fast in the spring was now no longer detectable.This is a plot that deepens as surprises explode unexpectedly and terrifyingly.It skidded terrifyingly along the runway amid clouds of dust.He was responsible for some of America's most terrifyingly violent crimes.Last night I dreamed terrifyingly about witchdoctors and ghosts.
